ProjectTitle: PulseFlour - Digestive, techno-functional and sensorial properties of pulse-based flours as impacted by their microstructural organization
InitialFeedbackHistory:
28/07/2023
Personal data:  When recruiting and contacting participants and by collecting informed consents you will process personal data, please include this in your ethics application. Also note that pseudonymous data is still personal data and falls under the GDPR.  
Valorization: you indicate that there is potential for valorization, therefore IP may be a factor restricting sharing, best to discuss this with LRD towards the end of your project to see if and how you can share data. 
Sharing: note that a DMP asks about the sharing of data underlying your publications, not about publishing (peer reviewed) articles in journals. For more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing or have a look in KU Leuven RDR for examples: https://rdr.kuleuven.be/
label: good with suggestions
